validateDocument

public static java.util.List<ValidationError> validateDocument(org.jdom.Document document,
                                                               java.lang.String schemaURI)
                                                        throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                               java.io.IOException
Validate a JDOM document against a schema.

Parameters:
document - The parsed JDOM document to validate.
schemaURI - The schema URI.
Returns:
List of validation errors. Null if no errors.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the schema URI cannot be read.
org.jdom.JDOMException - if the schema is invalid or validation fails.

validateDocument

public static java.util.List<ValidationError> validateDocument(org.jdom.Document document,
                                                               Schema schema)
                                                        throws org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                               java.io.IOException
Validate a JDOM document against a schema.

Parameters:
document - The parsed JDOM document to validate.
schema - A parsed schema.
Returns:
List of validation errors. Null if no errors.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the schema URI cannot be read.
org.jdom.JDOMException - if the schema is invalid or validation fails.

Simply returns without error if validation succeeds.
